trans-unit.source: Represents a reference in a discovery document to a service description.
XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available Web Services given an URL.
The URL usually points to a discovery document, which typically has a.disco file name extension.
Within a discovery document are references to information about the existance of XML Web services.
These references can refer to service descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas or other discovery documents.
This class represents a reference to a Service Description.
Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element.
The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes: `ref` and `docRef`.

The `contractRef` element must have an XML namespace matching the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Namespace> constant, whereas the `ref` and `docRef` attributes are placed in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> properties.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference"></xref> class using default values.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class using default values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference"></xref> class using the supplied reference to a Service Description.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class using the specified reference name.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>.
Property
Initial Value
The `href` parameter that represents the reference name.
The URL for a Sevice Descritpion.
Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref"></xref> property value.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference"></xref> class using the supplied references to a service description and a XML Web service implementing the service description.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class using the specified reference name and `docRef`.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>.
Property
Initial Value
The `href` parameter that represents the reference name.
The `docRef` parameter that represents the DocRef.
The URL for a service description.
Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref"></xref> property value.
The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description at href.
Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef"></xref> property value.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object representing the service description.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object representing the service description.
<xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol"></xref> property is `null`.

The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents"></xref> property of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol"></xref> does not contain a discovery document with an URL of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Url"></xref>.
Gets the name of the file to use by default when saving the referenced service description.
Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced service description to a file.
Gets and sets the URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description referenced in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref"></xref> property.
Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element.
The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes described in the following table.
Attribute
Description
ref
The URL for the service description.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property represents the value of the `ref` attribute.
docRef
The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description specified by the `ref` attribute.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> property represents the value of the `docRef` attribute.
The URL for a XML Web service implementing the Service Description referenced in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref"></xref> property.
XML namespace for service description references in discovery documents.

Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element, which is a part of the XML namespace specified in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Namespace> constant.
Reads the service description from the passed <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> and returns the service description.
<xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> containing the service description.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> containing the contents of the referenced service description.
Gets or sets the URL to the referenced service description.
Within a discovery document, a reference to a service description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element.
The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes described in the following table.
Attribute
Description
ref
The URL for the service description.The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property represents the value of the `ref` attribute.
docRef
The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description specified by the `ref` attribute.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> property represents the value of the `docRef` attribute.
The URL to the referenced service description.
Resolves whether the the referenced document is valid.

If the MIME type is `text/xml` and the contents of `stream` is a Service Description, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.
The MIME content type of stream.
The <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> containing the referenced document.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol"></xref> property is `null`.
-or-
The service description could not be downloaded and verified successfully.
Gets or sets the URL for the referenced Service Description.

For the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Url%2A> property returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property.
The URL for the referenced service description.
Writes the passed-in service description into the passed-in <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
The to write into stream.
The <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> into which the serialized <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> is written.
